entries.text: I was going to school after a long time and I was sitting on the ground with Harsh Khandu. We had old British teachers who we made fun of but he later called some senior teacher who beat up people with a stick. Janhavi appears who's class is across the hallway and she's like what do you have in your lunch. I had poha and jam (which i later realised was just Poha and ketchup). Harsh had Poha and sauce. She ate his and was looking at his laptop where some video about a political shortlist was playing. Last thing I saw was going into an empty washroom.

first dream was: me and ammar share same room which also has a common area. ammar had to help one if the f\&b shop in preparing burgers. i offered to help. that guy gave it all to me and that aunty who owned the shop to do and went back saying he had some other work. aunty was teaching me how to make burgers. then i started making more faster. i noticed burning smell. in a corner, an induction was on and plastic kept beside it which was touching the surface was burning i immediately turned it off from the switchboard but yk how it sometimes is still on? i couldn't switch it off from the power buttons. whenever i did it'd just change heat settings. So I told the aunty and we ran out. Running out thru hostel corridor I yelled fire fire in 113. i wondered what if my room burns down. i cant lose my laptop and ipad. so i after 5 mins, ran back in and saw two guards trying to extinguish fire from the wiring. i took my laptop, ipad and phone and ran out. and then in second? (maybe first only) i was telling this story to my friends. 

i also remember thinking should i keep this in dhruv's room? in this world he's also here

entries.text: I dream of some weird movie I'm watching and didi is sitting with me (not watching, sleeping). There's a scene where the train in moving horizontally. And I and some more people are sitting on stuff being pushed by the train. so like a moving chair I'm sitting on and training moving left like whole body of training is moving flat left towards a station. i wonder what happens if we reach statement because aise toh we'll crash with the platform. I imagine me standing and getting into the train and leaving the stuff there. but then i wonder what happens to the stuff. then I see I'm inside the train. but one chair is still outside. another train comes now. we are moving vertically. like normally. some more stuff like a baseball bat is now swinging in the air bouncing off of the body of the two trains very rapidly. not hurting anyone tho because everyone is inside. except this one uncle who went out to grab smth and now was sitting at the place where two magnets hold two boggies together. another slightly younger dude with him. some time later, one of those material that baseball bat hits that other guy, as both of them are holding tight, in his head. The thing I'm watching shows a description of how this happens: animated bat breaking a cement like structure representing his skull and i rewind and tell my sister about this. i tell her wake up but keep your eyes closed if you don't want spoilers and i describe it to her.

entries.text:
Haven't had a FB account in 19 years of my life. Never needed to.

But I wanna try out WhatsApp Cloud API so I created one today:

There's some event where I think Tiya is anchoring where I went to but somebody else was anchoring and Tiya came to right beside me and we're talking. She says we've talked for a while now and are "close" indicating smth ig. And then cut to we go somewhere and are making out. I'm touching her around the waist (and I don't remember us kissing but could be a sensible pre-cursor) and remembering how unsure I was about if I really like her. The me in the dream was very sure I like her.

* * *

Evening Nap:

Pethe comes to my room and asks me if I'm going to Dept Dinner. And I had asked Raj about this but it got filled up and then smth smth he went. I thought if Pethe is coming to rooms it must be a big thing and regretted missing it. He suddenly comes back and says we had to keep it limited because we can't accomodate entire phoenix dept. He goes on to talk about presentations that happened there. Somehow I can see the slides too. He shows course handouts in the event. I tell him can't we do it in 2 parts? but phds will also have to come twice. then i suggest them to livestream it. and Pethe promises me that he will.
All of this is happening while I'm on a break from cel outing where apparently i have someone's lost phone and i think it's warikoo's so he's coming to pick it up by walking 3kms. But turns out Gunjan has been trying to call me and it's hers. I'm telling mom and didi about warikoo issue on a call when he texts smth like phone lite, but just display this on the slides (scenario somehow changed to that of a coal event in outdoors). that image was supposed to be remembering some religious figure but it actually was of dadaji. Cut to I'm walk in Sarangarh and I called dadaji, who start with a v profesh intro of who he is (pandit etc etc) and then ask me who I am and I says "pranam dadaji" and he recognises and somehow there's some chick with me on the call and dadaji asks who she is and she said smth like my papa's sister in law or smrh (altho she was not mousi) and dadaji heard sister and asked how'd i have not recognised my own child and she said no no sister in laws

entries.text:
Another long overdue post. So throughout midsems and uske pehle I had been studying with Kashvi. And I usually like to keep my hand around the person. Kashvi didn't have a problem with that. But then when we were on the bb court that day and i was teaching her cp, I would hold her, play with her hair, touch her body. This was going into something extra-friend-territory. But I liked it and she didn't have a problem. (She later said she thought it was weird when my hands were close to her mouth but she'd not say anything because she knew my intentions are not bad.)

On the day of some midsem, when we were sitting on our usual spot, under the all-nighter's high I told her right before we were going from breakfast that you shouldn't let me touch you like that.

I have mixed feelings about it. I know for sure that it was wrong and it had to stop. But I cant stop fantasizing her. (She came in my dreams today doing some bakchodi but being very physically close to me by herself, clearly just a dream.)

She is still very attractive to me. I look at her and all I can think of is why is she not mine. why could she have not liked me?!

entries.text:
This entry is long overdue. A few days ago, I told the entire story of me liking Kashvi to Kashvi. Since then we've talked about this and a lot of things even more. And it's weird.

I know she isn't attracted to me. But she says she has a thousand reasons to say yes. (The question was if all other external factors ie Vinayak didn't exist would she have said yes.) She said what if by the time she realises I am good it's already too late. It has only made me wait for that time to come.

I love every time we spend together and I love she being my close friend. But the better the time is the more severe the pain of knowing she'll not be mine is.

entries.text:
I once read somewhere about this girl who liked a guy who probably liked her back but she never talked to him about this or took a chance.

Not because she feared if he'll say no or if it'll make things weird, but because she needed someone in her life to be obsessed about from a distance so that she can forget about the current problems. She feared what if the guy wasn't as good as he seemed. That'd make it harder for her to deal with her current problems.

I found this ridiculous and I still do but I know understand that pov more. It may just be more of me not wanting to try again and in fear of facing a rejection than anything else though.

entries.text:
Why tf is Projector so emotionally smart?!

Usually arguments develop in my head that keep taking up more and more mindspace to the point that they start threatening the established publicly demonstrated argument.

That is when I try to talk to what I call the Kunal's board of advisors.

Projector made me realise that Vinayak is not inherently evil. And that everybody has their flaws. My argument was that vinayaks flaws are not comparable to my or momo's or harsh's flaws. She said that they are, just how my flaw of cutting people when they are speaking is annoying and irritating to others while still being something I don't consciously do.

I said if you tell me to stop yelling or stop cutting, i will do that but if you tell V to stop ignoring he'll ignore that. How is that fine?

She says kashvi does a lot of things that irritate her but she doesn't think kashvi is a bad person. And she has her reasons she says kashvi is caring and supportive and handles her. Btw Vinayak rarely ever does anything like that for me, but I don't think I do that for him either.

I reply that part of me really thinks that Vinayak is a not the nicest person. I probably wouldn't be friends with him had khopcha not been a thing. Okay, that's not true. None of us would be friends if Khopcha wasn't a thing and Khopcha wouldn't feel the same wo him.

(Sidenote: V's other flaws: snatching any device whenever you're using it, if I'm telling someone something or telling a story he'd jump in and cut me and then ignore me, basically trying to sideline me.

She could ask why i haven't talked to him directly about this. Which would be fair. But this stuff is harder to quantify. You have to agree it's way easier to tell someone not to eat from your food because you saved that for yourself or not to take your book because you need it than to tell someone to not cut us in the middle---remember the reaction when kashvi did it?)

Vinayak has things that he does that are annoying. Here's the order of who I'm closest (as in talk to) to in Khopcha: Projector \> Kashvi \>\>\>\> Harsh ≈ Dhruthi \> Vinayak ≈ Momo \> Ria
And here's the order of who I find the most annoying to talk to: Vinayak \> Momo \> Harsh ≈ Dhruthi \> Ria ≈ Kashvi ≈ Projector

I mostly talk to Momo and Vinayak when they're not being annoying.

I really don't internally believe Vinayak is evil. He is a nice person who is well meaning. And the some places where I can see him to not be well meaning for me could be attributed to the gf's-best-friend-jealousy. (Altho that should also justify kashvi being jealous of you). But there're also memories of him being weirdly rude to me before I had met Kashvi. (How have I never seen there're used in a sentence before?!)

Compare him to SoBo. If everything else about SoBo remained as it is but he actually cared about us like a friend would you keep him as a friend? How do you say SoBo's annoyingness is not fine but Vinayak's is. Okay damn, there're so many things wrong with this thought. Like Vibe match. (Altho me and V don't really vibe match too).

entries.text:
# I'm over Kashvi
When I told the whole story to Projector, it felt nice. She told me that i have to avoid her. It is the sane thing to do. I did that, it was hard and awkward. I made two voice recordings about awkward situations I got myself out of making up weird reasons. I may have appeared somewhat rude to Kashvi. But she didn't seem to care. After all this happened, in this sem, we've barely spent any time together. Which is nice.

I thought atleast Kashvi liked having me when they were talking but it isnt true. There is this air of not closeness with me and Vinayak, we never hang out together. I think it's because outside the group we're not great friends.

Kashvi isn't so dumb that she hasn't noticed me making weird excuses and never spend time with her. Either she's not realising this because she's too happy about her current life (she should be, they have all the same classes and spend all day together) or she is too smart and knows why this is (unlikely tbh, this is too hard).

I'm back to the stage where looking at Kashvi Vinayak makes me not feel the best but atleast only because of jealousy of finding each other not jealousy to Vinayak.

Unfortunately, I don't think I can be the best friend to Kashvi. I'm too non-platonic with her. She herself is also getting distanced (one day I called her and she said she will tell me later what she and V are doing, later she said V said no but she convinced him that she will tell me bc Im a close friend, i knew it's something I dont wanna know but I still asked twice and she escaped and probably forgot but more probably decided not tell me.)

I will still need to be cautious and not on trips where it's just the two of us or three of us.

Projector's becoming better friends now and so is Momo. I spend most of my day with her and him and it's better. Altho yeah all of Khopcha are good hearted people.

entries.text:
# Projector
Note to my future self: I hope you're always in touch with Prajakta but if you're not, go on find her and ask her where can i buy her autobiography. It's gonna be an amazing book. I need a signed copy.

I can relate to a lot of what she and her bf are feeling. They're helpless. Love isn't working out. It sucks. There's uncertainty---what if he is the one? There's a need to do something she doesn't want to---break up. I know she'll break up tomorrow. It'll break her and him to their very core. Life will suck. There's days of crying that will follow. I want to help her get through this. I hope i don't back out when it gets hard, I won't. She's a good person.

entries.text:
# Texted D, finally
After talking to Aditi for about an hour where she gave me many plausible reasons on why not to do it, and me assuring her I won't because I have a personal rule that I will not text D unless I maintain this decision for 24 hours, I did it.

Highlights:

> I know that this is probably a bad idea. And I have no intentions of anything like trying to get us back together. (I don't lie.)
> I do still sometimes feel bad about losing you as a best friend I had for close to 2 years.
> I just want to know if you do too?


> Don't get it the wrong way, but I don't think that we'll ever be that close again. But obviously felt bad losing a friend whom I could resonate with


> This sounds crazy but honestly, when was the last time you thought about me?


> I'd rather not since it kind of doesn't make me very comfortable


> I want to know that bc knowing it was a long time ago might help me stop thinking too


> I missed your call....didn't call back because didn't know what to expect of it


> Dude pehle ka sab kuch yaad karna, specially how it ended, doesn't make me feel nice...so yeah I try not to think of it...though it will take time to get over it completely


> And honestly, mujhe wapis strong relations rakhne ka mann bhi nhi h


> I'd rather we talk kabhi kabar on chat


> It's weird when you break up with a close friend. The one person you want to tell all of this to and clear your mind is the one person you cannot.


> I understand but we don't really stand on that good grounds now so...
> I hope hum soughted h fir?


> Yeah


> Cool...thanks aage se reach out karne ke liye, I mean it🙂


> Tu ne kabhi kyu nhi kiya?


> Kyunki mujhe nhi pata tha ki tu kaise react karega aur m iss baat se darrti thi


> Once again, appreciate it


> I'm glad you do


How do I feel? I don't know. I'm sort of glad and sort of upset that I'm still slightly hung up on her.

Good thing: no more thinking about Kashvi for a while.
Bad thing: maybe if you don't get over someone in such a long while, you're not supposed to?

"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"I missed your call….didn't call back because didn't know what to expect of it
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Dude pehle ka sab kuch yaad karna, specially how it ended, doesn't make me feel nice…so yeah I try not to think of it…though it will take time to get over it completely
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"And honestly, mujhe wapis strong relations rakhne ka mann bhi nhi h
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"I'd rather we talk kabhi kabar on chat
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"It's weird when you break up with a close friend. The one person you want to tell all of this to and clear your mind is the one person you cannot.
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"I understand but we don't really stand on that good grounds now so…
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"I hope hum soughted h fir?
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Yeah
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Cool…thanks aage se reach out karne ke liye, I mean it🙂
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Tu ne kabhi kyu nhi kiya?
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Kyunki mujhe nhi pata tha ki tu kaise react karega aur m iss baat se darrti thi
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"Once again, appreciate it
"},{"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"indentLevel":1,"quote":true}},"text":"I'm glad you do
"},{"text":"
"},{"text":"How do I feel? I don't know. I'm sort of glad and sort of upset that I'm still slightly hung up on her.

"},{"text":"Good thing: no more thinking about Kashvi for a while.
"},{"text":"Bad thing: maybe if you don't get over someone in such a long while, you're not supposed to?"}],"meta":{"created":{"platform":"com.bloombuilt.dayone-android","version":448},"small-lines-removed":true,"version":1}}

entries.text: Weird dream where me and Dhruv (Sanjay Jain) were doing some work together where we were covering some things from chemicals like we do in pest controls. We go to his house after it's done. I have to go to somewhere else but can't until it's over and I'm sitting in front of him in a desk, he's looking at me while I'm working. I asked him for how does he study and stuff. He says he does everything 6-8 times. And I find myself writing in my diary (in a terrible handwriting) that the reason I don't do good is because I barely study once, that's because i start too late and that's because I procrastinate. And his mom sees this copy and thinks I'm not studying and just wasting his time. She writes some case like problem on it as a mock to what I did. I was going to clarify it to her that I'm not disrespecting his son or wasting time before I stood up to leave but somebody came in to call me and I didn't do it in front of them. Later I called her and told these things.

entries.text:
Everytime my head gets this thought that there's maybe some chance of me and Kashvi, I later in my sane state get a bit of disgust for myself.

I cannot do that. Vinayak is a friend. A good friend. And in any case, she likes him too much.

Let's be real: The way Kashvi sees me is the same way I saw Srushti or Aditi. I liked spending time with her but not romantically into her. She's not even a bit romantically into me. And it's alright, I'm glad I have atleast a good friend in her. She's good in a bunch of respects. I appreciate that.

I do believe V got a big first mover advantage. But that's ofc not realistically true. My first impressions are bad, I've too much face fat. I know Kashvi won't say it to my face but yeah if I get better she will mention how bad I used to look. So i do look bad now.

And kunal, listen: Kashvi and you can never happen. Even if you get better---which you should not for her but for future girls---she already has a bad first impression of you which will never change.

Now as a good friend, if i ever intend to tell her this, it's only in the following scenarios:

I'm dating someone else and we're still close friends.

entries.text:
Last two years there are only two things I have obsessed over, only two things I have thought about every day and those things are this college and Disha.

In an alternate world, had I gotten attention from some cute/"Interesting" girl here, would I have regretted that I am in a committed thing with D? Would I have regretted being you know non-declared yet committed relationship with D? The latter for sure. But I'm not sure, from the deepest of my hearts,---and this may be the conditioning of the past 6 months talking---But from the deepest of my heart I'm not sure I can say the former for sure.

I am probably not ready for something so serious. I don't think I would like to be the guy who found the one before even reaching college and while he was 18. She is probably not the one. Maybe definitely not the one and probably will never be the one, but I don't want to live in hopes. That's worse

She did say why am i discussing this w you instead of my bf? And i said it's about you not you and him

entries.text:
So I'm at D101 and I'm sitting beside this girl who was up until now sitting alone. A few awkward eye contacts. She's pretty.

I tell myself the window for making small talk is over ab padh le but she comes up and asks something about the syllabus. The doubt is pure bs. She did this to talk to me.

I ask her name, it's Amy. She's in EEE. I ask her how have I never seen her before and she asks me the same thing. She asks me what clubs I'm in, and I ask the same. She says art and deco and before we talk further it hits her we should study. I say true, and get back.

I go out to call mom come back, after some time she goes out for a call, after some time i go out again to talk to didi and come back and right now she's gone to talk to someone else.

I got curious and I looked it up, amy. Hmm. I find no amy. I was sure maybe the spelling is amie or smth. Still can't find her. I look up girls in EE (EE+CH7) and I see no amy. Wtf!

Why would someone tell me a fake name?

Should I confront?

Planning to ask her out to a walk as a break.

---

Did both!

So she calls herself amy thats her nickname, her actual "birth certificate" name is Devashree.

Got her insta id.

I asked if she wanted to take a walk, she said she just came from one, she said bye and i later got up walked up to her and said I'll walk you to ch7, and then go for a walk from there she said it's fine you don't have to and i said i anyways have to walk, it got awkward, tbr. Oh and when I came to her she was on a call, which i didn't realise. So basically I came off a lot a lot despo.

entries.text:
A few days ago, Projector told me about her secret bf. And one, I have so much pressure to have a secret gf now lol, just me, Ria (Aw-Oh-Aa) and Momoare single right now. Not reliable people lol.

Two, damn. First Harsh and now Projector. Harsh does ring a lot of alarming bells but Projector? Now she has made me realise that maybe just maybe finding the love of your life online via texts and voice/video calls is possible. Still not the best way but it is possible.

And I see her life right now. She's complaining about how hard it is to LDR in college. There's coursework, clubs, skill development, chilling with friends, parties and events, outings etc. It's just too hard to always have to be on texts/call with D.

But wait, comparing LDR to no-R is not fine. Compare LDR to OCR (On Campus Relationship), you'd get to spend time physically together. And be free at the same time. Study together and party together. OCR \>\>\> no-R \>\> LDR.

entries.text:
Good day despite the bad start.

Woke up at 12:05, cursed myself and made this joke to everyone I meet that my body is playing a joke on me, my sleep completely disappears just 5 mins after my last class and this happens very often. How ever many alarms I put up. How ever much I try. I can do nothing but try some more.

Anyways, had lunch, went to library, saw a text from that hot QC Coordi, got my Face ID reg'd and was taken to this obscure storage room behind LT3 where Quark's RC Race stuff was stored and we had to measure their dimensions.

After that went to QC Work Sess and found somebody to call and called him, he didn't pick up but called back about an hour later and showed a lot of interest in giving a guest lecture.

Now I'm studying for EG (Got 20/20 in last assignment, 3 more than Shreya Das!)

entries.text:
I sometimes look at Cashvi and be like shouldn't she have been with me? And other times I be like she is better off with Vinayak.

Wouldn't I want someone more assertive? I like someone with a bigger personality than me. Better qualities than me. D had that.

I'm glad she's dating Vinayak. She's smart, open-minded and shares much the same characteristics as me. But she feels too much like me for me to like her as much as I've liked D. And Vinayak is too sweet for me to do this to him. I know for sure that I will never.

I have this feeling that Dorothy fits this criterion well. Bigger than me personality. I need a way to charm her. I need to work on myself and get myself under 60kgs. Good looking and slim are too highly correlated to be ignored.

Next imp thing is dressing. That I'm working well towards.

entries.text:
# I'm forgiving Disha
On 20 March, she did mention that she will be better able to decide if she is romantically into me or not. Which she, on 14 April, found she was not. She liked my personality and she didn't change her stance about that.

1. She deserves to get a butterflies in her stomach wala love story atleast once.
2. People prefering attraction as a main cause in their relationships is like a bell curve: Noobs want only physical attraction, hot partners. Mass of the mid says attraction doesnt matter, only personality does. But the expert, experienced end says attraction/obsession matters just as much as personality.


Did she do the right thing? Somewhat.
- I can't blame her for "ending the relationship for absolutely no reasons," lack of attraction and butterflies is a good enough reason.
- I do still think she could've been a little clearer and more considerate about this. But this was her first too.


Plan of action:
- Put efforts on yourself. Get more attractive. **If you think you deserve someone who looks good, she deserves it too.**
- Delete your pathetic-ass feelings for her without painting her as a bad person.


**The only way this will happen if your current life is happier than your imagined life with her.** What's happier? By definition, you want a mix of the two kinds of happiness: short term and long-term.

The former is taken care of by college without much effort from your end. But actually do put efforts, gain confidence, talk to new people. Until then, bond more with people you know.

Never eat alone. Be genuinely interested in people's stories. Be more frank, blunt and honest. But be considerate, careful and trustable 10x more.

Long term happiness is when you have a sense of hold over your life. The way to get this is by managing time and putting efforts into everything you do everyday.

Study. Play a sport. Learn singing. Run around. Freelance. Build.

The key to everything in life is:

**Time Management.**

entries.text:
Kashvi and Vinayak finally confirmed that they are indeed dating since 1 Oct. And it was me and Harsh that made them think about this. They're good friends and good people. I am happy for them. I feel a little jealous and sad that I'm single but it's alright.

Vinayak said Kashvi and Kunal by mistake when telling something and Kashvi said I don't date short heighted boys, I mean it's alright she didn't mean ill for me. But being short heighted is kind of an insecurity for me. I shouldn't let this get to me. They're nice people.

I later texted cashvi this:

but in all seriousness, congratulations. Midsems ke baad I planned to talk you about that time when you said the only reason you're not dating is because you worry what will happen to the group if you breakup. you guys do look really adorable together. happy for you. and sort of happy that i helped a little bit.

also both of you can always talk to me if you need to about anything. ghanta mere advice se kuch hoga but you'll feel better letting it all out.

She said:
I am actually glad when u say that we look adorable together for some weird reason🙃

entries.text:
Have I lost the ability to be happy on my own?

Two things are absolutely essential: to be happy in your own company and to make people you like, like your company.

It increasingly feels like I've got a crush on Kashvi when it's actually just a crush on the type of life she's enjoying and not her as a person. Probably. I mean she's nice. And I'm happy that she found someone she likes who likes her back, which is why it feels weird to think about this. But lets just assume the KashVi thing never happened and they're not into each other. I'd probably be pretty close to her and she'd be a nice option. She's perfectly sized for me (lol), smart, interesting, excited and whatnot.

One good thing D incident did to me is that i do not think highly of anyone now. People feel less exciting now which is nice, I don't get infatuated to someone easily, which is great. I probably wont be infatuated to D if we ever get to interact.

entries.text:
I just found Disha's [instagram](https://www.instagram.com/disha.singhi12/). I feel weird. I just wanted her to be unhappy. (Although it does made me think whether I'd really want D if only a poor life experience has made her like me). And somehow it looks like creating an insta acc means she's started having fun.

How can I get completely over her?

Obviously I'm never sending her a follow request.

I could post more on my Insta but the reason I don't is because I just feel better not having to ready up before others and the solution to this is probably being good naturally.

Anyways. What sucks is maybe not that she was not into me and maybe much more that I could never recognise that.

i have this new theory that maybe I'm attractive only in group contexts. When the group is designed in such a way that I'm already familiar and comfortable with the group and the girl is the newcomer, I appear attractive. This worked on Disha, Adita, maybe even Moni.

This time my approach at becoming friends is a lot like my unsuccessful approach during 2013-2018. I try to fit into popular groups (altho now I'm happy fitting into any good group). I think the reason this works now and didn't work earlier is (a) I've changed, maybe have become funnier, less cringey. Could be that I was very immature for way too long and it's going off. I should look into improving my testosterone levels, something I was mentally quite against. And (b) the quality of people around me is improving, as life goes forward the cutoff to be around me is increasing in a direction that helps me be around people who're smart and mature. Single biggest indicator of this change is the frequency at which people laugh at my weird pronounciation of words. This used to happen all the time in 2013 and now in 2023 nobody pointed that out ever.

With this strategy, I'm much more resilient and much less dependant on a single person. I've my eggs in more basket than one.

But I do feel lonely sometimes. I think it's good to be lonely sometimes (like rn!). Journalling is a way better option to handle problems than telling anybody else.

The perfect balance could be a bestfriend-cum-romantic-partner + a group of friends.


## Why do I think about this in times like these?
it's not D who's attractive. Or the fact that she made an Insta that's really bothering me. It's not D. It's my boredom and want to escape the reality (midsems, freelance project deadline).

Why do I not think of D when I'm happy? This is probably the single biggest proof that I'm not that into her anymore.

Remember how she was profusely remembering me during her bday party? Or atleast after that. She couldn't be sad about anything else, right? She was actually missing me.


## What do I need to improve upon?
- Discipline. Finish work on time. Not at the end. Stop using Parkinson's law and deadlines too much. If you were living a balanced life, you'd forget how D looks easily. And that's not even why you should do it. You should do it bc it's college. Fix yourself.
- Confidence. Doubting things is good. But be convinced that you're the best you could be. Walk around without thinking about what others think of you.
- Put in efforts into yourself. Go put oil once a week, or go shopping and get new clothes.

entries.text:
Walking around with Kashvi.

So there was this day (ig yesterday night) when we were playing truth or dare. Harsh asked Kaashvi which guy she liked the most from first years. She said that guy with long hairs i saw in D Mess once. And Harsh said say a name that you know and have talked to.

And she hesitated and resisted. Harsh kept pushing. I'm not sure if I saw this correctly but i think i saw her eye pointing to me and then Harsh stopped asking.

After a round of this. We wanted to change the question. It was my turn and Harsh said aacha Kunal bta what do you not like in Kashvi. And maine toh keh Diya there's nothing that I don't like---which is true.

entries.text:
My dream today was a mish-mash of Ted Lasso. And weirdly a Mercedes Benz was there just beside a Grofers-like showroom which was Benz's subsidiary. The female lead was a mish-mash of Siya Dadpe (classmate), Disha (neighbour) and Aditi (doesn't come back).
For some reasons, Sonia ma'am got me and Siya some tiffin and during lunch break we had it separately. I saw PP doing weird tricks. Then I went to Sonia ma'am who was teaching about what to do with the tiffins and she said clean it and put in the corner of the garden in left side of G-floor staff room. While going away, a guy came from behind and told me that ma'am said write a project about it and submit and I went towards ma'am but I was feeling v tired while walking, turned out ma'am had nothing more to say and she wasnt calling me. I went back, i think CS class had started some new teacher which was like Jena Sir. I went in and told sir I need Siya because ma'am gave us some work. But he said wait for sometime. And I entered the class and sat down. And a few moments later, he asked Siya about romantic interest in me and we were talking and then cut to my apartment lobby where sir was there and he went up to 3rd floor to get her too (Siya + Disha mish-mash) and then we were invited to their house and we got in to her bedroom and were talking about the conflicts between me and her. Sir didn't took sides but she did listen to him more. The house was a little shabby-ish and that's when the girl shape-shifted to the final Aditi's conflict and behaviour + Disha's house + Siya as a classmate mishmash.
Weirdest and most people-involved dream ever.

entries.text: I dreamt that there's some officers roaming in our school asking for if we know anything about some terrorists. he's very friendly. me and bunch of friends were showing him random pics that got captured in our phones and asking that person was similar to the terrorists he's looking for. i had some random pics of a guy with different levels of beard and it struck me he could be the one. i showed it to the officer saying, don't show it to others i don't wanna accuse someone publicly just in case he's not. he sees and says it's not. i get my phone back after he had taken it for a closer look. (ps i just remembered that the classroom this dream is set in is Law College L3, I'm sitting on second last row left column) when the phone is in my hands, i get a message on telegram from aditi. my first reaction is to hi;4de the message because I dont want anybody to see. but i happen to read it. it said "stop this, I'm very tired" or smth like that. it meant stop showing your phone to the officer and helping him. she's very tired and she wants him to leave soon. that's when a thought struck me what if aditi is the terrorist they're looking for. i didn't anything but someone from the officer's team found her and she ran into a small room. here I was thinking how everything weird about aditi (and in my dreams there are more weird things about aditi than in reality) is a sort of obvious sign she's a terrorist. like once i helped her find some weird looking remote on an airplane (which could be a bomb remote). one more time she tells me she came from some very faraway place and only has a small dumb phone that she uses to communicate. Meanwhile, inside the room where the officers had taken her, there was she and a few others including me. right in an instant after she confessed, she found a gun from somewhere and killed all other people in the room except me. and then she puts the gun in her mouth facing upwards towards her head and she kills herself. in that room were only bodies, blood and a confused me deciding between should i run away as fast as i can or take a minute to absorb what happened, absord the trauma. oh and i was thinking, after all, on the other side of the screen, aditi was actually laughing at my gullibility.

Her reply (which in the dream i was checking the next morning) was "11:00 baaje se 12:50, bs itna hi thi teri neend?" which now seems like a thing hard to understand but uss samay i instantly got it (cause i made it up) that it meant she saw me online at 12:50 when I was fast asleep which can only mean mom's been checking my phone regularly.

entries.text:
Recap:

you just had to do this na. i messed everything up. once fucking again. here's a little story. me and my ex-bestfriend were friends for over an year. like the bestest friends ever. nothing romantic but i felt like how tf could i be this lucky. i was at the top of the world. we knew every little thing about each other, hidden secrets that i had promised myself when i was 10 that i wouldn't tell any fucking body on earth, i told her that. it was magical. i had someone who understood me. You don't know every day for the whole year I was like I'm so so grateful to the world that i met her. She was really too good to be true. but then, suddenly, one day it all came down. Almost instantly. I told her something. I was well-intentioned she knew that. But i didn't realise how it'd affect her. And that triggered. She blocked me. I only vaguely knew why she blocked me so one day when she did unblock me i asked her. It was 2 months later. She told me and i really couldn't believe what her side of the story was. She said i used her like she's my therapist. I dumped things down on her. And she's right. I'm a terrible best friend. And just like that my friendship ended. The best one i ever had. It meant the world to me. I loved her (not romantically) more than anything else. And then she was gone. It coincided with the time i was getting serious about jee prep. It was when i started spending most of my day at aakash. And so it didn't hit me instantly. I was always buried in a lot of work. But it took a while but it eventually hit me. I realised what i had lost. I locked myself in the washroom and cried. Except my home is not so big so I can't be loud. I cried and screamed without making a sound. And it happened a few more times. It took me a lot of time to get over her. And i had stopped sharing my secrets with anybody. But then you came. I always considered you a good friend. And one day you tell me I'm your best friend. And i started to trust you. I told you a deep secret. The story. And it didn't go very well. A day later i ask you if we're still best friends and you say no. I later found out it was not only about the story but also about the few jokes i did. I didn't realise you'd take it so seriously. I should've been more cautious and should've thought what you'd have thought. I'm the worst best friend ever.

entries.text:
Every single person i like but have a bad relationship with. And that means i at the end hurt them unintentionally. is with a imposter syndrome driven person. Underconfident.


Eg: Srushti, Didi, Aditi, Moni(?)

And disha is the opposite.
* * *

Twice in 5 months. I've lost two best friends in the last 5 months. I'm doing things very wrong.

People don't understand what i mean. Jokes hurt. If my shine blinds people i care about it's so much of a dilemna what i should be doing.

Need to be away from people. Not have any best friends. Especially especially female best friends.

\---

Right when i heard her side of the story from herself, i remembered this email exchange with a socialscribe customer.

She refunded socialscribe on appsumo so i emailed her with an apology, saying "something was broken with her appsumo license key" (i usually lie something here because it doesn't really matter, actually my own systems have bugs) and offered her 20% off to resubscribe (if she pays via my own payment system).

After a few more email exchanges about her making her links work and explaining it, she asks why does she have to pay with my own vendor

I tell her appsumo doesn't allow me to send out coupons. And explain her steps to buy.

She says she's confused bc on my plans page it's $29 a year and on appsumo its same price for a lifetime.

I tell her I'll turn it into a Ltd from my end. And because I'm usually testing out new pricing models i asked if she would like to pay $19 a year instead. I just wanted to try out an arbitrary number.

And she says:

> I don't understand why you think I would decide to pay you $19 a year instead of paying $23 once? Why would anybody choose that? I also think it's super sketchy that you sold a code that didnt work and then in the process of fixing the code, tried to get me to sign up for an annual plan instead of the LTD I bought to begin with. It doesn't make any sense.
> 
> Please delete my account and all related data, immediately. Thanks.

Since this was less personal than ending friendships i could easily do what's right:


> Firstly: All your data has now been irreversibly deleted from Socialscribe servers. Your account will not work anymore.
> 
> The only action required from your end is to clear the cookies set in your browser (for logging in purposes) which you can do by just clicking this link: https://socialscri.be/logout
> 
> (Also, this is not required, this is just to clear the last trace of your account.)
> 
> Second: Sincere apologies. I did not intend to deceive you. Socialscribe is just my little side project and I keep experimenting things like new pricing and how'd customers react to discounts and offers. But I can totally see how sketchy it would have appeared to you and there's no doubt that this is unacceptable.
> 
> Thanks and apologies again.
> 
> — Kunal

entries.text:
Today i realised something. When I had first gotten dummy(-ish), teachers often said "we know for sure nothing would come out of skipping school and going to coaching so much. You'll regret it." And I used to think I'll show them. But today I understood. It's not about playing the status game of showing the world their defeat it's about taking what matters to you---good internal marks. 

How come nobody has proved to our teachers this? I used to think. But turns out smart people just admit to teachers they were wrong and they should've listened to their teachers and so they get sympathy points. 

This happened to me as ma'am was talking to me about my Chemistry prep and I told her with a unintentional straight crying-type innocent face that organic hasn't been started at Aakash. So ma'am was like yes I know your prep is not so good i can tell from your face and she taught me one whole chapter. Wrote notes in my own copy. Seem to be pretty happy to me so I'm hopefully gonna get good internal marks. And i also got the whole day to myself to study. Win-win. 

It's great to bow down and submit. Satisfy the other persons ego and dont satisfy yours. You're here for actual gains. The wealth game not the status game. Don't pay the extra for the status, lose status---have the courage to be disliked---and get the extra benefits. 

A million dollars without anybody knowing \>\>\> hundred thousand dollars + fame.

entries.text:
Today I met Aditi's, on paper one year elder but actually one year younger sister Adita. She seems nice. Aditi tells me right after she exited our classroom she said i was really cute. Watch out, people are falling for me in the first sight. 🤷‍♂️

That makes the list (people i don't really know very well who fell for me): Yummy, Harshita, Urvi.

***
Aditi also got me wondering whether i regret not saving my first romantic moments for a special someone. I mean right after I told myself waiting for such a special someone is useless, I should rather start now and learn about what i like, it'll also be better that I have experience in how to make relationships work before i started it with someone i really really like. It's funny that i found the special somone right after i thought that. Weird coincidence.

So all in all, i kind of not regret it. My deep fear is D is so perfect for me and what if it's a bummer for her. All i want is it to not be. Fingers crossed.

entries.text: There is a bit of Ted Moseby inside me. It's now one of my life long dreams to organise an amazing date for someone. Right now, that seems to be D. I've realised, countless other times, how much me and she connect. It's not the usual. The one big power dynamics problem that happens with everyone doesn't happen with her. Besides she also doesn't get offended on jokes. Picture a date. Shores of Goa. D flew in and I picked her up. We spend the day together on the beach, in the markets (yes, shopping, who would've thought I could think of shopping as enjoyable) then just about anything she likes. Definitely some dancing. We like the same songs too!

entries.text:
So I forgot my earphones in my pants pocket yesterday and I found one of the earbud at the bottom of the washing machine and the other on the floor of the balcony where we spread wet, washed clothes to dry. 

Obviously I needed a new one. Even though I claimed warranty for the old earphones they're supposed to be picked up this week. 

I've told mom they stopped working and she wasn't angry. After I showed her the new earphones on amazon thrice on 3 random occassions, she said go buy it. 

Surprised she agreed so quick, I realised it's a combination of
1. She wants to reward me for my good grades at aakash (but the test after that went terribly, i got way less in that)
2. For studying seriously. I've been spending nights and all the day time studying (pulled two allnighters in a week, for 2 exams)


But i feel really really bad.
1. I lost the earphones to sheer laparwahi
2. I got bad marks at the next exam at aakash
3. I've still not been able to tell mom my marks at school exams. Chemistry: 14. Physics 17.5. Maths: \~20. English: 22.5. CS: 21. (Approx don't know exactly, except Physics)


I'm now under high pressure to perform good this half yearly. Better start the prep.

entries.text:
Last night, after dragging myself through a bunch of videos about bits goa and a bunch of googling about jee and bitsat, i got myself to study p-block. I'm nowhere close to done but it felt good.

I had thought i first need to do this and then that before i could start it but no. Just start. Everything will figure itself out over time.

***

I also came across this profound quote:

> Success is just enjoying whatever you do.

Which makes so much sense. Even if i fail, i had enjoyed the journey it's a success. Even if i won but didn't enjoy the process it's a failure.

***

I also randomly DM'd Debleena Dutta, my high school senior. Who called me cute once indirectly ofc. And she also saw me stare her *repeatedly*at Nemo's bday party.

entries.text:
prado dropped a giveaway like tweet with super dms and i reached out saying if he wanna try out my app.

he said hell yes. i washed. wore my capri. washed hands. and rushed out of the washroom to start it.

sent prado the link. we got on a call, he explained to me problems with superdms, i explained how easy it is with twift and we were ready. 

showed him around. got something wrong so had to take a little while to debug and we were done.

launched it on one of his tweets. the cron job failed. i found the error replaced it. now it should be working. the last cron was too long. we'll see it tomorrow morn.

he pitched me on working together on this. i played cool. but was jumping on the inside. 

we're to discuss this setting. equity and profit sharing. and a better name.

* i do think prado was little too overconfident. he said we'd get to 10,00,000 inr a month (1000 users paying 1000 inr, mostly napkin math)
* his expectation is for me to build this into a stable and reliable thing which he can handle the sales of. 
* we both want this to be an additional side income. and if it goes well enough I'll get to leave jee for ever.

entries.text:
danced so much at a baarat for the first time in my life. I've always been awkward at public dancing situations like these but today was different.

i was with Prateek bhaiya and he said he wouldn't dance and i said we both wouldn't. but then when the time came, he didn't hesitate neither did i. 

we danced a lot. as time passed the awkwardness lessened. there was swapnil (a cousin) who was where i was years ago. feeling so weird, he was standing right there with everyone forcing him to dance but he didn't.

i tried too but not too much. things you've got to figure out oyo.

---

thanks srush for pushing me to go here. this will help me be more confident (& yk why i need that lol 🤭😏). besides I'm now more convinced that trying out new things is a foundational value of my life.

entries.text:
years back, we went to vaishnodevi, my fam and happy bhaiya's fam.

so during our walking trip to the top, i was atop a pithu (basically a person who carries small kid who can't walk so much, to the top) while mom dad and didi were walking.

people were screaming to keep up the motivation. one guy lead with "jorr se bolo" rest replied "jai mata dii" 

(they were creative as to say "sunai nhi diya" to make people scream louder")

so dad started leading too. after 2-3 times of "jorr se bolo" and public following him with "jai mata di" he said "sunny ka pithuu" and public said "jai mata di"

fun how it's one of the best memories of that trip. dad's small gesture of not thinking what others will say and do something so sweet (and a little scary for embarrassment) is something i admire a lot. 

i wish I'll not hesitate for doing it for my child ever. thanks dad. :)

(i dont want to end up like Sheldon saying "i loved my dad but didn't tell him this enough" I'll tell this

last night, talked to Disha for over 2h. 

She again told me tu call hi nhi krta and I told her call krta hu toh tujhe lgta hai bohot frequently kr rha. And she was like arrey woh toh mazak tha. kr liya kr call. something like that. 

some things i learned from the call:
- She has a best friend she has many things in common with
- Her mom apparently was talking about me some time maybe. she refuses to tell what. 
-

close to the end of the call, she asked tera 6:30am uthne ka kaisa chal rha hai. I said aaj kal kahan bohot thand hoti hai. she: *chal mai utha deti hu tujhe kal. bta kb?* me: *umm 7?* she: *thoda jldi bol na* me: *saadhe 6* she: *okay*

and she did call me at 6:34. I had made sure to turn off mute on my phone but forgot to increase call volume so i didn't hear the ring. i woke up at 7 and whatsapped her. she replied: *"Tu uthe ya na uthe, meri neend zarur udadi tune😒"*

last night, mom took away my phone and checked it.

by a little margin, she missed moni's msg "bye gn ily😘"

she also read what i wrote to gunnu: "jab mai moni chhaath jayenge na..."

she also read a lot of my and disha's chats but most of them were in English and were harmless jokes.

mom locked the phone in an almirah and went out with dad. she forgot to lock it though. i sneaked in and found it open and got my phone and erased all traces. 

as i completed it all, mom or dad (probably dad) saw me online on WhatsApp. 

i was careful enough to put my phone in flight mode so if they called they'd return empty handed. 

but they saw me online on WhatsApp, when i was messaging and telling everyone to not message me because phone's with mom.

she read Gunnu's msg where she said raghav was tharki (which, shockingly, mom didn't knew the meaning of).

entries.text:
Last thing im telling you about her:  (no need to reply)

if she does have, she should so any sign. anything at all. even giving me more attention counts. or talking to me. or
 anything. 

rn, plan is I've stopped messaging her. 

(whole another story: i always message first, she replies late slow and minimal and she looks very disinterested to talk. when i feel like i wanna talk i convince myself i shouldn't wait to be who im and i just say it. last time someone did this exact thing to me, she was that girl who later blocked me, yk her. she was clearly disinterested in talking so acted like this and i kept forcing the convo. and now it feels terrible.

 so im not gonna msg her first from now on. if she does, then ok but from now on, no more msg-ing first. it does feel like playing status games vs actual value games but okay. and there was a brief period of time when she did msg first sometimes idk what was with her then but it certainly isn't so now. 

side note ends)


plan part 2 is I'm gonna ask her why she blocked me. if she has a plausible explanation for that everything else is sorted. that's the only part of the puzzle that makes your argument (that she's a crush on me) storing. without it it's done. no clarification needed.

if she doesn't, which again makes your argument stronger, I'll ask her to tell me atleast when she'll tell encouraging her to tell right before she leaves for jaipur maybe that'll make it easier for her to tell.

if she still doesn't, I'm gonna ask her directly if she's got a crush on me. on chats. after she's gone. so I'll be prepared for a no and an awkward reaction from her because I'll not meet her for months and no need to talk so i might as well block her myself. 

rn the best case scenario would be she having a plausible reason for blocking me which will put an end to all this. me you and gf failed to find such a reason which means if she tells any reason which makes sense she's not lying or making it up. if she had to lie, she wouldn't tell which is a open option to her in case she indeed has a crush on me. 

medium case scenario would be she saying hell no when i ask her directly. that'd make it way awkward but she won't be back for 1.5 months so I'm safe. and she might forget or I'll act like I've forgotten when she comes back.

worst case scenario though is she saying some form of yes. honestly i dont want that to happen. and realistically i do realise i shouldn't be doing all this to find out. but i just can find peace with not knowing. curiosity (idk even if should call it that) is killing me. 

if that happens, i still have 1.5 months to politely decline and offer to be friends only. 

(another side note: remember her story of how a guy proposed to her? she mentioned then that she hates pda. so still this very less chances she'll ever propose even if she tells me she likes me.)

PROBABILITIES

to be roughly realistic, the probability of 1st case i think is 30%, 2nd is 50+% and third is 10-20% ig

sent

entries.text:
felt nice talking to Disha. and no it's not cheating on my gf. I'm not kissing her or doing anything that's off the limit. 

and I'm pretty sure she's NOT into me, maybe im a good friend. maybe best one here. but shes definitely not crushing on me. 

though it does remind me how often i get fooled by people's behaviour. i dont have a great EQ.

okay, what's the worst: she's into me.

what can go wrong?

she might propose. definitely not in front of anyone, most probably in chats.  

she might go forward with a kiss? (if so, she's definitely romantic). 

in any case, I'm gonna say no. but will definitely say let's be friends. and just get over all this. not sure howll she react but okay let's see.

it's in my best interest for her to never reveal. yet it's so hard to not know..

entries.text:
Got on a call with prado today. 

I finally got the texts.com invite i was waiting for and then prado said he was free for only a hour now. So we both just jumped in.

Super fun chat. And we talked about a lot of things. 

In other news, thor sent me pictures. Actually thor didn't see the msg first and sent the wrong pictures but then i (selfishly) told thor to click again and then i finally got it. Never gonna break thors trust. Never ever. Whatever happens.

I wanna start working on Tastey right now.

But i also have a lot of HelloMeets work to do.

I'll finish that first and then start with Tastey.

Chemistry prep went incomplete. It's near to 2am right now and I'm nowhere close to finishing the prep off. In fact I'm not even trying. I stopped trying hours ago. Did half a lecture, read a few mcqs hoping somehow magically the exact same ones will come up on the exam and whatnot. 

Reality check. Heres actually how much I've prepared:

7 chaps coming. I've done 2.5 in aakash. And i slightly did 0.1 of another chapter through a lecture. So i can say I'm done 3.1 chapters. But good news is these are the big chapters, they account for 21 out of 35 marks of the test. 

I'll just take a look at the 3 chaps I've done once again and call it a day. 

Facing tomorrow will be hard.

This is way too personal. Today, idk what came to my mind, but I googled about something weird I've been doing for all the years I've lived.
I've been doing it since the time i didn't even knew what is was. And i still do it.
A lot of people have seen me doing it, they know i habitually do it but i really don't think they know what I'm actually doing.
(If you're family, and you're reading this wondering what is "it", please don't ask me or make me tell it.)
And i told srushti about it too late at night. (She was telling me about her new crush and how they met, super cool)
I also worked on my personal website kunal.tech and paid for it's hosting 530 bucks. Tho me and srushti plan to buy a bettee plan and 50-50 it next month. That'll be 300-300 for us. And we can both create 50-50 websites. 
I also got an email from sivers.com saying thanks for buying all their digital books (which Derek gifted to me) without replying to my earlier email requesting the same.
